long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: tia is your AI-powered copilot that turns questions into insights, connects you to targeted resources, and propels your learning journey. As a generative AI application, tia revolutionizes digital learning experiences by offering predictive search functionality that goes beyond answering immediate queries. It serves up additional channels for discovery and exploration, including in-app knowledge base articles and relevant courses or learning paths from a customer's academy.
